title: Bug 109718: Text item tip shows content in one line instead of given format
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. Expected Result: The tip shows the content in the given format

Actual Result: The tip shows the content in one line
OB: When saving and putting the mouse on a text item, the tip that appears shows the content in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tip should show the content of the text item in the given format.
